name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-pnpassistant
title: Declarative Agent - PnP Controls Assistant
shortDescription: This declarative agent is designed to assist users in finding more information about the PnP reusable React controls.
longDescription: This declarative agent is designed to assist users in finding more information about the PnP reusable React controls. It provides a user-friendly interface for users to ask questions and receive relevant answers based on the information available in the PnP documentation.

thumbnails.alt: Declarative agent for PnP Controls Assistant

references.name: Microsoft 365 Copilot extensibility
references.description: Learn more about what Microsoft 365 Copilot and how you can extend it.
